description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In the post-zombacalyptic times, the dark city is ruled by zombies.  Few survivors who got stranded in the last two towers are looking for help. Batter the zombies to death or gun them down in this realistic survival adventure. Will you stand against these mutated zombies?
description.short: In the post-zombacalyptic times, the dark city is ruled by zombies.  Few survivors who got stranded in the last two towers are looking for help. Batter the zombies to death or gun them down in this realistic survival adventure. Will you stand against these mutated zombies?
